text.*:
Alex Cross
Created by James Patterson
Films and television
Film(s)
  • Kiss the Girls (1997)
  • Along Came a Spider (2001)
  • Alex Cross (2012)

The Alex Cross film series is an American series of thriller films, based on the fictional character of Alex Cross, who originally appeared in a series of novels by James Patterson. In the series of three films, two actors have portrayed Cross.

Contents

  • 1 Films
    • 1.1 Cancelled sequel
  • 2 Cast
  • 3 Crew
  • 4 Reception
    • 4.1 Box office performance
    • 4.2 Critical and public response
  • 5 References
  • 6 External links

Films[edit]

  • Kiss the Girls (1997)
  • Along Came a Spider (2001)
  • Alex Cross (2012)

Cancelled sequel[edit]

Prior to the film Alex Cross (2012) release, it was announced that Double Cross would be adapted into a film, with Tyler Perry reprising the role.[1] However, the film was cancelled after Alex Cross did not perform well at the box office.
